characters.name: Luna
characters.appearance: Long, curly brown hair, green eyes, pointy hat, white dress, carrying a staff

panels.description: Twilight sky with pink and blue hues, Luna standing at the forest entrance, looking in
Luna walking into the forest, leaves rustling beneath her feet, mist rising from the ground
A soft, ethereal light emanates from a nearby tree, Luna reaching out a hand
A gentle, glowing light envelops Luna, a soft, whispery voice responds, a forest spirit materializes
